Comments.Message:
Hello Pierre63,

Thank you for using our code sample request service. 

I'd like to confirm with you my understanding of the sample request:
    On the basis of your description,You has some questions about our sample code. I have contact with our project engineer. He give me a useful information about this sample is run under IIS FTP7.5, So it has different setting with the different environment.
If you have enough information about this sample,thank you for contact with us with this code sample request service.



Thanks
All-In-One Code Framework
http://1code.codeplex.com

Whenever I try to log in to my ftp it appends the url to the username and this is not accepted by the host.
I've tried to find how to correct this but it escapes me.
Can anyone offer any help?
Thanks
Bob
